title: Zygor Guides v4.0.7225 (September 18th, 2013)
description:
Zygor Guides update v4.0.7225, released September 18th, 2013. (Horde and Alliance)



Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary 


Changelog:

-------


Version: 4.0.7225
Released on: September 18th, 2013
[A] Leveling
Fixed waypoints and typos in the leveling guides

[B] Professions
Fixed pathing in several gathering steps

Version: 4.0.7216
Released on: September 16th, 2013
[B] Achievements
Added the "Timeless Legends" achievement
Added the "Champion of Chi-Ji" achievement

[H] Leveling
Added the Honeydew Village flight path and home location to the Jade Forest guide

[B] Pets/Mounts
Fixed reported errors with the Blue Porcupine pathing

[B] Professions
Fixed an issue that would claim you could not continue a profession to the Zen level at level 80

[B] Reputations/Dailies
Fixed several issues with the new Golden Lotus dailies
Fixed routing issues with the Kalu'ak reputations guide

Version: 4.0.7207
Released on: September 13th, 2013
[B] Achievements
Fixed an error where the "Killing Time" achievement would skip through to the end
Fixed reported issues with the "Treasure, Treasure Everywhere" achievement
Fixed a display error with the "Timeless Champion" achievement

Version: 4.0.7205
Released on: September 12th, 2013
[B] Dailies
Fixed reported issues with the Timeless Isle Dailies

[B] Achievements
Fixed bugs and errors reported in the Timeless Champion Achievement
